channel.title: Anime: Read the latest articles on anime related character series and movies in cinema world | Hindustan Times
channel.description: Dive into the multiverse of anime and stay up-to-date with the latest news, reviews, and information about your favourite anime series, movies, and mangas at Hindustan Times.

image.title: Anime: Read the latest articles on anime related character series and movies in cinema world | Hindustan Times

item.title: Exploring the diverse world of anime: A guide to anime genres and sub-genres
item.description: Understanding the different genres of anime is important for both fans and beginners as it helps to navigate the vast array of options available and helps you discover shows that match your personal tastes and interests

item.title: Understanding Japanese Entertainment: The Difference between Anime and Manga
item.description: It is a common misconception that manga and anime are interchangeable terms, with manga being defined as Japanese comics and anime being the animated version of those comics

item.title: A beginner's guide to watching anime: Tips and recommendations
item.description: Originating from Japan, it has become a global phenomenon and captured the hearts of millions of fans all over the world. Do you want to watch anime but don't know where to start? If yes, then this beginner's guide to help you get started

item.title: The top 10 must-see classic anime series of all time
item.description: From being watched and rewatched by fans to influencing numerous contemporary anime, these classic anime series have become synonymous with the best of the genre, making them to anime what "Hamlet" is to the theatre, "Pride and Prejudice" is to literature, and "Mona Lisa" is to art
